effect.x-y: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.

flavor_text.x-y: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
